value.unicode:
\074tal:block xmlns:tal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/tal"
 xmlns:metal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/metal"
 xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n"\076
 \074tal:block metal:define-macro="master"\076
 \074span id="jump" class="jump" metal:define-macro="jump"\076
 \074select name="select_jump"
 onChange="submitAction(this.form,'Base_doJump')"\076
 \074option selected="selected" value=""
 i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Jump...\074/option\076
 \074/select\076
 \074button type="submit" name="Base_doJump:method" title="Jump"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description"
 i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Jump\074/span\076
 \074/button\076
 \074/span\076
 
 \074span class="separator"\076\074!--separator--\076\074/span\076
 
 \074span id="action" class="action" metal:define-macro="action"\076
 \074select name="select_action"
 onChange="submitAction(this.form,'Base_doAction')"\076
 \074option selected="selected" value=""
 i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Action...\074/option\076
 \074/select\076
 \074button type="submit" name="Base_doAction:method" title="Action"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description"\076Action\074/span\076
 \074/button\076
 \074/span\076
 
 
 \074span class="tool_buttons" metal:define-macro="tool_buttons"\076
 
 \074!-- XXX: exchange_actions seems to be bad condition --\076
 \074span class="first"
 tal:define="search_actions actions/object_search | nothing;
 exchange_actions actions/object_exchange | nothing;
 report_actions actions/object_report | nothing;
 button_actions actions/object_button | nothing;
 fast_input_actions actions/object_fast_input | nothing;
 sort_actions actions/object_sort | nothing;
 ui_actions actions/object_ui | nothing;
 print_actions actions/object_print | nothing;
 list_mode list_mode | nothing;
 can_modify_portal_content python: portal.portal_membership.checkPermission('Modify portal content', here)"\076
 \074span class="separator"\076\074!--separator--\076\074/span\076
 \074tal:block tal:condition="list_mode"\076
 \074button class="cut" type="submit" name="Folder_cut:method" title="Cut"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"
 tal:condition="can_modify_portal_content"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Cut\074/span\076
 \074/button\076
 \074button class="copy" type="submit" name="Folder_copy:method" title="Copy"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Copy\074/span\076
 \074/button\076
 \074button class="paste" type="submit" name="Folder_paste:method" title="Paste"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Paste\074/span\076
 \074/button\076
 \074span class="separator"\076\074!--separator--\076\074/span\076
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074button tal:condition="print_actions" class="print" type="submit" name="Folder_print:method" title="Print"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Print\074/span\076
 \074/button\076
 \074button class="new" type="submit" title="New"
 tal:attributes="name python: list_mode and 'Folder_create:method' or 'Base_createNewDocument:method'"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076New\074/span\076
 \074/button\076
 \074button class="clone" type="submit" title="Clone"
 name="Base_createCloneDocument:method"
 tal:condition="not: list_mode"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Clone\074/span\076
 \074/button\076
 \074button tal:condition="list_mode" class="delete" type="submit" name="Folder_deleteObjectList:method" title="Delete"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Delete\074/span\076
 \074/button\076
 \074tal:block tal:condition="not: list_mode"\076
 \074tal:block tal:condition="request/selection_index | nothing"\076
 \074span class="separator"\076\074!--separator--\076\074/span\076
 \074a class="jump_first" title="First"
 tal:attributes="href string:portal_selections/viewFirst?$http_parameters"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076First\074/span\076
 \074/a\076
 \074a class="jump_previous" title="Previous"
 tal:attributes="href string:portal_selections/viewPrevious?$http_parameters"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Previous\074/span\076
 \074/a\076
 \074a class="list_mode" title="List Mode" tal:attributes="href python: here.portal_selections.getSelectionListUrlFor(request.get('selection_name', None))"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076List Mode\074/span\076
 \074/a\076
 \074a class="jump_next" title="Next"
 tal:attributes="href string:portal_selections/viewNext?$http_parameters"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Next\074/span\076
 \074/a\076
 \074a class="jump_last" title="Last"
 tal:attributes="href string:portal_selections/viewLast?$http_parameters"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Last\074/span\076
 \074/a\076
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074tal:block tal:condition="list_mode"\076
 \074span class="separator"\076\074!--separator--\076\074/span\076
 \074a tal:condition="search_actions" class="find" title="Find"
 tal:attributes="href python: portal.ERP5Site_renderCustomLink(search_actions[0]['url'], http_parameter_list, dialog_category='object_search')"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Find\074/span\076
 \074/a\076
 \074button class="show_all" type="submit" name="Folder_show:method" title="Show All"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Show All\074/span\076
 \074/button\076
 \074button type="submit" name="Folder_filter:method" title="Filter"
 tal:attributes="class python: here.portal_selections.getSelectionInvertModeFor(request.get('selection_name', None)) and 'filter_on' or 'filter';"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Filter\074/span\076
 \074/button\076
 \074a tal:condition="sort_actions" class="sort" title="Sort"
 tal:attributes="href python: portal.ERP5Site_renderCustomLink(sort_actions[0]['url'], http_parameter_list, dialog_category='object_sort')"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Sort\074/span\076
 \074/a\076
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074span tal:condition="exchange_actions | report_actions"
 class="separator"\076\074!--separator--\076\074/span\076
 \074button tal:condition="exchange_actions" class="import_export"
 type="submit" name="Base_doExchange:method" title="Import / Export"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Import / Export\074/span\076
 \074/button\076
 \074button tal:condition="report_actions" class="report" type="submit" name="Base_doReport:method" title="Report"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Report\074/span\076
 \074/button\076
 \074a tal:condition="fast_input_actions" class="fast_input" title="Fast Input"
 tal:attributes="href python: portal.ERP5Site_renderCustomLink(fast_input_actions[0]['url'], http_parameter_list, dialog_category='object_fast_input')"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Fast Input\074/span\076
 \074/a\076
 \074tal:block tal:condition="button_actions"\076
 \074span class="separator"\076\074!--separator--\076\074/span\076
 \074tal:block tal:repeat="button_action button_actions"\076
 \074a tal:attributes="href python: '%s%s%s' % (button_action['url'], '?' in button_action['url'] and '\046amp;' or '?', http_parameters)"\076
 \074img i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"
 tal:attributes="src button_action/icon;
 title button_action/name;
 alt button_action/name" /\076
 \074/a\076
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074tal:block tal:condition="list_mode"\076
 \074tal:block tal:condition="ui_actions"\076
 \074span class="separator"\076\074!--separator--\076\074/span\076
 \074a class="configure" title="Configure"
 tal:attributes="href python: portal.ERP5Site_renderCustomLink(ui_actions[0]['url'], http_parameter_list, dialog_category='object_ui')"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Configure\074/span\076
 \074/a\076
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074/span\076
 
 \074span class="second"\076
 \074a tal:condition="preferred_html_style_contextual_help"
 class="jump_help" title="Help"
 tal:attributes="href python: portal.ERP5Site_getHelpUrl(current_action=current_action, current_form_id=current_form_id, workflow_action=request.get('workflow_action'))"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Help\074/span\076
 \074/a\076
 \074a tal:condition="preferred_html_style_developper_mode"
 class="inspect_object" title="Inspect object" href="Base_viewInspectionReport"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Inspect Object\074/span\076
 \074/a\076
 \074a tal:condition="here/hasActivity | nothing" class="activity_pending"
 title="Activity Pending"
 tal:attributes="href python: portal.portal_membership.checkPermission('View management screens', portal.portal_activities) and '%s/portal_activities/manageActivities' % (portal.portal_url()) or '#'"
 i18n:attributes="title" i18n:domain="ui"\076
 \074span class="image"\076\074/span\076
 \074span class="description" i18n:translate="" i18n:domain="ui"\076Activity Pending\074/span\076
 \074/a\076
 \074/span\076
 \074/span\076
 \074p class="clear"\076\074/p\076
 
 \074script type="text/javascript"\076
 //\074![CDATA[
 gadget = RenderJs.getSelfGadget();
 gadget.render = ERP5UI.updateContextBox;
 gadget.render();
 //]]\076
 \074/script\076
 
 \074/tal:block\076
 \074/tal:block\076
